global_feedback:
CRITICAL GLOBAL CHANGES NEEDED:

1. CARD TEMPLATES: Create consistent templates for each card type to ensure uniformity across all parashiyot. See /card_templates.md for specifications.

2. IMAGE CONSTRAINTS:
   - NEVER use God's name (יהוה) in any image
   - Use first 10 Hebrew alphabet letters on tablets
   - NO QR codes
   - NO transliterations anywhere

3. ACTION CARD CONSISTENCY:
   - Consistent font style for titles
   - Fixed number positioning
   - Consistent Hebrew keyword styling (use action_5 style)
   - Always include English below Hebrew word

4. CHARACTER CONSISTENCY:
   - Moses must always have head covering
   - Use character reference sheets for all images

5. CONTENT STANDARDS:
   - Define emotions simply for 4-6 year olds
   - Use nuanced emotions (not 'happy' or 'sad')
   - Anchor cards must say 'Parashat [Name]' in Hebrew
   - Power word cards need direct Torah quotes
